data.title: Oleksandr Horban
data.text:
← Back to list

Oleksandr Horban (born on September, 24, 1971 at village Ivanitsa, Chernihiv Region, Ukraine) – Doctor of Science (Social Philosophy and Philosophy of History), Professor of Philosophy, Professor of Chair of Philosophy at Borys Grinchenko Kyiv University. Author more than 130 scientific papers.

Research Fields: Social Philosophy, Philosophy of Education, civil society in the coordinate system of social relations, Philosophy of Videogames, Philosophy of the City.

Editor-in-Chief of “Educological discourse” journal, member of Editorial board of “Osvitolohiya (educology)” journal, analytical and information journal “Skhid”.

Education and Training

2011 – Doctor of Science (Philosophy), specialty – Social Philosophy and Philosophy of History. Post-Doctoral thesis: “Civil society: the idea and its implementation mechanism (socio-philosophical analysis)” (V.I. Vernadsky Taurida National University).

2004 – Ph.D. (Philosophy), specialty – Social Philosophy and Philosophy of History. Ph.D. thesis: “Stratagem sustainable development (social-philosophical analysis)” (V.I. Vernadsky Taurida National University).

1994 – 1997 – V.I. Vernadsky Taurida National University, Ph.D studies.

1988 – 1993 – T.G. Shevchenko Chernihiv State Pedagogical University (diploma with honors). Specialty "History and Law”. Qualification: teacher of history and law.

1978 – 1988 – Comprehensive secondary school in the village of Ivanytsia, Chernihiv region (awarded by gold medal).
